import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; export default function Preview() { const [dept, setDept] = useState(''); const [sem, setSem] = useState(''); const [sect, setSect] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]) // Ensure Axios sends credentials axios.defaults.withCredentials = true; // Clear form fields const handleClear = () => { setDept(''); setSem(''); setSect(''); setDate(''); }; useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/preview') .then(users => setUsers(users.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) // Form submit handler // const handleSubmit = (e) => { // e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default form submission // axios.post('http://localhost:3001/preview', { dept, sem, sect, date }) // .then(result => { // console.log('Form submitted successfully:', result); // }) // .catch(err => { // console.log('Error submitting form:', err); // }); // }; return (
